__e: Can't I just pretend he moved to the South Pacific and lived happily ever after?
And, I tell you sometimes when I was in the south Pacific, the fact is, that I used to think about this girl.

What's important is that there's a little girl... and she's all alone somewhere deep in the middle of the South Pacific... and, well, she-she-she's badly injured herself... and I feel - I feel quite responsible for this.
We were going to the Battle of the Pacific and there was no one who wasn't scared.
A very peaceful place and what has happened has shattered that peace.
It's not that. If the war was still on and I could do some good... .
